@@ -58,1 +58,1 @@ - *

Verifying a JarInputStream

+ *

Signed JAR Files

@@ -65,2 +65,3 @@ - * The {@link #getManifest()} method returns the {@code Manifest} for the JAR - * file + * The {@code Manifest} is the first entry in the stream (or the second + * entry if the first entry in the stream is {@code META-INF/} and the + * second entry is {@code META-INF/MANIFEST.MF}).
